scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc && rsync -av --exclude='*.ts' --exclude='manifest-*.json' browser-extension/ dist/
scripts.build-firefox: npm run clean && npx tsc && rsync -av --exclude='*.ts' --exclude='manifest*.json' browser-extension/ dist/ && cp browser-extension/manifest-firefox.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.build-chrome: npm run clean && npx tsc && rsync -av --exclude='*.ts' --exclude='manifest*.json' browser-extension/ dist/ && cp browser-extension/manifest-chrome.json dist/manifest.json
